title: How To Use Google Sheets as a Database With React via Next.js
author: Paul Scanlon
description: How to use the Google Sheets API via React as a database. Choose this method over a more traditional database for one reason: data retrieval.
cntitle: 如何通过 Next.js 将 Google 表格用作数据库与 React
cndescription: 如何通过 React 将 Google Sheets API 用作数据库。出于一个原因，选择此方法而不是更传统的数据库：数据检索。
